front.title: RTP Payload Format for Society of Motion Picture and Television Engineers (SMPTE) ST 336 Encoded Data

abstract.t: This document specifies the payload format for packetization of KLV (Key-Length-Value) Encoded Data, as defined by the Society of Motion Picture and Television Engineers (SMPTE) in SMPTE ST 336, into the Real-time Transport Protocol (RTP). [STANDARDS-TRACK]
